name: Locksmith
summary: Unbelievable! Someone created the most complicated locks in the world. Captain Red-Hat Jack was assigned to grab the enemy's defense information centre's distribution plan, but firstly he must to resolve the series unbelievable locks to achieve his assignment. So time, intelligence, nervous and exciting will come with Jack always during the spy's war. Do you think he will finish this impossible mission? The answer is "you're better to help Jack!"
